name: Brain Blast Turbo Tap
description:
How fast is your reaction time?

Brain Blast Turbo Tap will challenge even the fastest app users to improve their hand-eye coordination. Turbo Tap features 12 themes that are unlocked through game play. The more you play the more rewards will be unlocked.

Challenge your friends to a duel with the 2 player mode. Let's see who can score more points in this shootout mode.

Compare your achievements and high score with your friends in Game Center. Compare your scores to others from around the world.

As an added bonus Brain Blast Turbo Tap will help improve your mental agility.

The ability to react and make decisions quickly is the key to a successful life. Brain Blast Turbo Tap helps you improve your reaction time.

Professional athletes, such as baseball players, tennis players, race car drivers and many more practice their reflexes on a daily basis. The improved agility gained through daily practice enables them to make decisions faster and therefore gain a competitive advantage.

Brain Blast Turbo Tap is an app that will help you get the same split second reflexes as those high performance athletes. The skill/ability based speed adjustments in this game enable you to be challenged at your reaction time limits at all times.

The more you practice your reaction time the better you're reflexes and decision making will get.

We recommend playing this game for five minutes daily in order to improve and maintain your brain's agility.



Visit WWW.BIDBOX.COM for more great apps
